review.title: “Take the good with the bad”
review.pros: Pros – It is a really fair environment to work. I got a lot of experience, and the employees are really supportive to help you develop your skills. This is a great place to work if you want to work with competent individuals and a caring boss. He has done a lot for his employees.
review.cons: Cons – Unfortunately, the prices are high, and the clients are not shy about telling you so. Because the boss is so non-confrontational, you will be asked to deal with some of his battles.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Annual performance reviews would be great to help employees maintain morale in a business that doesn't provide much positive feedback.
